languages.text: {n}Проходит, кажется, целая вечность. Внезапно вы понимаете — воздух больше не обжигает легкие, а тело под вашими руками становится податливее, словно застывшая кровь вновь начала течь по жилам. Вы слышите прерывистый, измученный вздох:{/n} "{name}? Что... произошло?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Проходит, кажется, целая вечность — хотя на деле, вероятно, лишь десяток секунд. Внезапно вы понимаете — воздух больше не обжигает легкие, а тело под вашими руками начинает становиться податливее, словно застывшая кровь вновь начала течь по жилам. Спустя еще немного вы слышите прерывистый, измученный вздох, и Хейнрикс тихо выдыхает:{/n} "{name}? Что..."

languages.text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"
languages.original_text: {n}Проходит, кажется, целая вечность. Внезапно вы понимаете — воздух больше не обжигает легкие, а тело под вашими руками становится податливее, словно застывшая кровь вновь начала течь по жилам. Вы слышите прерывистый, измученный вздох:{/n} "{name}? Что... произошло?"

traits.locale_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

{n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

{n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

{n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

languages.text: {n}不知过了多久，你突然意识到你的肺部不再因为呼吸感到灼痛，手臂之下的身体也开始变得温软，仿佛他的血液已经解冻，在血管中慢慢再次流动。你听到了粗重而痛苦的喘息声。{/n}“{name}？这是……怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}不知过了多久，你突然意识到你的肺部不再因为呼吸感到灼痛，手臂之下的身体也开始变得温软，仿佛他的血液已经解冻，在血管中慢慢再次流动。你听到了粗重而痛苦的喘息声。{/n}“{name}？这是……怎么回事？”

languages.text: {n}Pasa una eternidad, aunque sea subjetiva. De pronto te das cuenta de que al respirar ya no te arden los pulmones y que el cuerpo que hay bajo tus manos se vuelve más flexible, como si la sangre helada en sus venas se derritiera. Oyes un jadeo tortuoso y rasgado:{/n} «¿{name}? ¿Qué... qué ha pasado?».
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasa una eternidad, aunque sea subjetiva. De pronto te das cuenta de que al respirar ya no te arden los pulmones y que el cuerpo que hay bajo tus manos se vuelve más flexible, como si la sangre helada en sus venas se derritiera. Oyes un jadeo tortuoso y rasgado:{/n} «¿{name}? ¿Qué... qué ha pasado?».

languages.text: {n}永遠の時間が過ぎたように思える。突然、あなたは呼吸がもはや肺を焼かないことに気づき、両手の下にある身体が、まるで解凍された血液が血管を流れているかのように、よりしなやかになっていることに気がついた。あなたの耳に、苦しげなうめき声が聞こえる。{/n}「{name}？何が…起きたんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}永遠の時間が過ぎたように思える。突然、あなたは呼吸がもはや肺を焼かないことに気づき、両手の下にある身体が、まるで解凍された血液が血管を流れているかのように、よりしなやかになっていることに気がついた。あなたの耳に、苦しげなうめき声が聞こえる。{/n}「{name}？何が…起きたんだ？」

languages.text: {n}Le moment suivant semble durer une éternité. Soudain, vous vous rendez compte que votre respiration ne met plus vos poumons à la torture et que le corps que vous enlacez devient moins rigide, comme si son sang s'était remis à couler.{/n} « {name} ? {n}dit Heinrix d'une voix torturée.{/n} Que... s'est-il passé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le moment suivant semble durer une éternité. Soudain, vous vous rendez compte que votre respiration ne met plus vos poumons à la torture et que le corps que vous enlacez devient moins rigide, comme si son sang s'était remis à couler.{/n} « {name} ? {n}dit Heinrix d'une voix torturée.{/n} Que... s'est-il passé ? »

languages.text: {n}Es fühlt sich an, als würde eine Ewigkeit vergehen. Plötzlich bemerkst du, dass Einatmen sich nicht mehr so anfühlt, als würden deine Lungen verbrennen. Heinrix' Körper in deinen Händen wird etwas weicher, als ob sein Blut aufgetaut wäre und wieder durch seine Adern fließt. Du hörst, wie er gequält röchelt:{/n} "{name}? Was ... ist geschehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Es fühlt sich an, als würde eine Ewigkeit vergehen. Plötzlich bemerkst du, dass Einatmen sich nicht mehr so anfühlt, als würden deine Lungen verbrennen. Heinrix' Körper in deinen Händen wird etwas weicher, als ob sein Blut aufgetaut wäre und wieder durch seine Adern fließt. Du hörst, wie er gequält röchelt:{/n} "{name}? Was ... ist geschehen?"

languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "? What... happened?"

languages.text: {n}Zaman, âdeta sonsuzluğa uzanırcasına akıyor. Aniden nefes almanın artık ciğerlerini yakmadığını ve ellerinin altındaki bedenin, eriyen kanın damarlarında akmaya başlamasıyla gerginliğini attığını hissediyorsun. Düzensiz, eziyet dolu bir soluk duyuyorsun.{/n} "{name}? Ne... Oldu?"
languages.original_text: {n}It seems like an eternity passes. Suddenly you realise that breathing no longer burns your lungs, and the body beneath your hands is becoming more yielding, as if thawed blood is flowing through his veins. You hear a ragged, tortured gasp:{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"
